code: @Test public void testThrottlingRoutePolicy() throws Exception {     // we use seda which are not persistent and hence can loose a message     // when we get graceful shutdown support we can prevent this     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMinimumMessageCount(size - 10).     for (int i = 0. i < size. i++) {         template.sendBody(url, "Message " + i).     }     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     ThrottlingInflightRoutePolicy policy = new ThrottlingInflightRoutePolicy().     policy.setMaxInflightExchanges(10).     from(url).routePolicy(policy).delay(3).to("log:foo?groupSize=10").to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             ThrottlingInflightRoutePolicy policy = new ThrottlingInflightRoutePolicy().             policy.setMaxInflightExchanges(10).             from(url).routePolicy(policy).delay(3).to("log:foo?groupSize=10").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
